items.sentence: Tom would like to ask you a couple questions.
You\'re not going to get away with this, Tom.
You\'re not the first person to tell me that.
When was the last time that you baked a cake?
When you hurt others, you also hurt yourself.
Tom is doing everything he can to save money.
Tom likes to do almost everything by himself.
I wonder why Tom just didn\'t ask us to help.
I can\'t imagine what it\'s like to be there.
Tom\'s parents were very impressed with Mary.
Tom is the one who told me not to trust Mary.
Tom is very interested in Australian history.
Tom knew right away that something was wrong.
I like Chinese food better than Mexican food.
Tom didn\'t pay any attention to the warning.
Tom didn\'t really mean what he said, did he?
Tom didn\'t return home until after midnight.
Did you stay at Tom\'s place for a long time?
Tom is the one who told me who to give it to.
Which one of those books did you give to Tom?
